summary: Two cables from Mexico City. The first discusses letters addressed to Angel Guadalupe Rivera and a request for a letter drop FORTI CRYSTAL-1. The second cable mentions Jerzy Plebanski attending a symposium in Dallas on gravitational collapse and related topics. It also references MEXI 7218 and PBSWING as a source. A review of Gobernacion file reveals Plebanski granted permission to leave Mexico for conferences in the U.S.
title: Cables Regarding Letter Drop and Jerzy Plebanski's Travel to Dallas
